skillTree.localised_description: If anything, this one has an even greater lust for life than they did before their death.

skillTree.localised_description: "I say you can find out the servants of Death by their marks. No man is born so unnatural that his body does not revolt at the foul pollution of Undead blood.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
"Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"
If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.
Strike true; strike hard.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.
"Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The strength and agility of the Vampire comes from a place beyond: the supernatural realm of the Unliving.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.
A hybrid of familar and new magics, the disiples of abhorash have new and powerful tools to stay in the fight.

skillTree.localised_description: No matter how far away, none can escape the Kiss of the Deep, nor breathe again with lungs full of seawater.

skillTree.localised_description: Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death…

effects.description: You're body moves with supernatural speed and precision, slicing all in your path into bloody ribbons

skillTree.localised_description: The first master of the Blood Dragons still walks among their ranks, and sees all that is done in his name.
A true knight will never abandon his armour; sometimes the steel skin appears to be part of his body.
Once the mighty Kraken's tentacles take hold, only the toughest can fight their way free.

skillTree.localised_description: W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ever searching for a worthy opponent, only the most skilled shall ever have a chance of drawing blood from I
Fury is a tool, to revel in it is weakness.
Through eons of violence, one must be careful lest they fall into insanity. Pledge yourself instead to the thrill of perfection and not the act itself
The cattle rise and fall like grains of sand, we however, endure forever in our pursuit of total martial mastery.

nodes.localised_description: The true objective ofant disciple of the wanderer is the perfection of their martial craft through near continous combat.
Those who drawn to Walach's quest of annihlation share in his vision and beilief that the time has come to stamp out once and for all humanity's weakness.
